item.title: ADF: Employees Can’t Be Forced To Lie About Pronouns At Work
item.description: Employees don't have to insist on calling people by pronouns they don’t like. But they don’t have to say something they know is not true.

item.title: Trump revives push to downgrade marijuana in federal drug laws
item.description: Marijuana might not be on the federal government's list of most restricted drugs for much longer.

item.title: Trans Lawyer Who Asked SCOTUS To Redefine ‘Sex’ Can’t Produce A Definition When Asked
item.description: Trans-identifying lawyer Chase Strangio couldn't present a coherent definition of 'sex' without resorting to feelings and ideological babble.

item.description: When it comes to children’s upbringing and education, bureaucrats are again proving they don’t know best.
